titleStmt.title: The ioynt declaration of the severall counties of Kent, Essex, Middlesex, Surry, unto the souldiers of the army, now under the command of the Lord Fairfax.

publicationStmt.publisher: Published by direction of divers Gentle-men of the said counties,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of pubication from Wing.
